subject: AI & Agents
title: Ask Clarifying Questions Early
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Ask Clarifying Questions Early.

hook.text: Agents fail quietly when they guess what the user meant.

buildup.text: Every guess is hidden risk: wrong tool calls, wrong emails, wrong data.

discovery.text: Ask early when it changes the plan: missing constraints, budget, or target.

twist.text: Too many questions feels annoying. Ask the smallest question that unblocks.
